name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learning Notes Plus for Web page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learning Notes Plus makes it easy to use Notion cloud notebooks to write notes for web pages.
short.zh_TW: 網頁的 notion 筆記小幫手

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make it simple to take web notes

LN+ for Web makes it simple to take notes with Notion while viewing web pages in a browser.

Five aspects distinguish LN+ for Web.

1. It won't make two notes for the same web page.

2. When you revisit the website you previously visited, it will prompt you where the note's link is.

3. Auto-layout a sidebar for a blank note

4. Access your online notes database quickly

5. Utilize Notion's robust database features to define the many contexts for your notes.
long.zh_TW:
讓做網頁筆記變得簡單

LN+ for Web 使得在瀏覽器中檢視網頁時用 Notion 做筆記變得簡單。

LN+ for Web 有五個功能特色：

1. 它不會為同一個網頁做重複的筆記，LN+ for Web 會幫你確認你的筆記與網頁是 1 對 1 的關係

2. 當你重新訪問你以前訪問過的網頁時，它會提示你筆記的連結在哪裡

3. 為一個空白的筆記自動佈置一個側邊欄以方便你一邊閱讀網頁一邊寫重點筆記

4. 快速訪問你的線上筆記資料庫

5. 利用 Notion 強大的資料庫功能，為你的筆記定義多種情境 ( Context )
